soilLab.organicMatterLow: Low organic matter. Add compost or manure.
soilLab.organicMatterModerate: Moderate organic matter. Maintain with cover crops.
soilLab.organicMatterHigh: High organic matter. Excellent soil health.
soilLab.phAcidic: Acidic soil. Consider adding lime to raise pH.
soilLab.phNeutral: Neutral pH. Optimal for most crops.
soilLab.phAlkaline: Alkaline soil. Consider adding sulfur to lower pH.
soilLab.moistureLow: Low moisture retention. Add organic matter.
soilLab.sandyDescription: Sandy soil drains quickly but has poor nutrient retention.
soilLab.siltyDescription: Silty soil has good water retention and nutrient availability.
soilLab.clayDescription: Clay soil retains water and nutrients but can be poorly drained.
soilLab.loamyDescription: Loamy soil is ideal with balanced drainage and nutrient retention.
soilLab.defaultRecommendation: Add balanced fertilizer and maintain organic matter levels.

howItWorks.title: How Disease Scan Works
howItWorks.description: Our AI-powered disease detection system helps you identify plant diseases quickly and accurately. Follow these simple steps:
howItWorks.step1: Take a clear photo of the affected plant part (leaf, stem, fruit, etc.)
howItWorks.step2: Upload the image using the upload button above
howItWorks.step3: Our AI will analyze the image and identify any diseases present
howItWorks.step4: Review the results and follow the recommended treatment options
